summary: The incredible story of the 1992 Lithuanian basketball team, whose athletes struggled under Soviet rule, became symbols of Lithuania's independence movement, and - with help from the Grateful Dead - triumphed at the Barcelona Olympics.
cast: Bill Walton|Jim Lampley|David Stern|Mickey Hart|Chris Mullin|Dan Majerle|Greg Speirs|David Remnick|Mitch Richmond|Zydrunas Ilgauskas|Dennis McNally|Fran Fraschilla|Sarunas Marciulionis|Tommy Sheppard|Rimas Kurtinaitis|Chad Ford|Charles Smith|Valdas Adamkus|Alexander Wolff|Kim Bohuny|Arvydas Sabonis|P.J. Carlesimo|Jonas Valanciunas|Sergejus Jovaisa|Arturas Karnisovas|Vladas Garastas|Donnie Nelson|Vytautas Landsbergis
director: Director: Marius A. Markevicius (as Marius Markevicius)
title: The Other Dream Team
